title: Big, brightly lit 2br 1ba apartment for rent in North Berkeley
posting_body: I'm trying to fill an updated two bedroom one bath apartment in the Northbrae neighborhood of Berkeley, near the intersection of Hopkins & Sacramento streets (entire apartment is for rent :)
The condo is near shops & restaurants, and across the street from Monterey Market and Espresso Cafe Roma.
The North Berkeley BART station is a ten minute walk south on Sacramento, and a ten minute walk west brings you to more shopping & dining in Westbrae on Gilman.
Five minute walk to the east on Hopkins is King Park with a pool, tennis courts, etc. UC Berkeley is a 12-14 minute bike ride.
The apartment has big windows and is brightly lit.
It's located on the top (3rd) floor and is 883 square feet, has a full kitchen with quartz counter top, oven/stove, fridge, dishwasher, and is being updated with new cabinet doors & drawers.
There are separate living and dining areas along with a study niche, two large bedrooms, and a jacuzzi tub in the bathroom.
There are hardwood floors throughout, and a wood burning stove / fireplace in the living room.
The five unit building has a shared laundry room with free washer and dryer.
There is a designated parking space in the driveway out front.
Extra parking is usually available on the street around the corner (no permit needed!)There are no shared walls with the adjacent units, but there's a shared garden patio out back.
The condo will be available sometime in late August on a 12 month lease (will prorate for start date).
Trash is included in the rent.
Please email me if you're interested !
